name: This is Telegram Messages Filter Userbot
description: This is Telegram Messages Filter Userbot in Pyrogram

SOURCE_CHAT_ID.description: Source Chat IDs. Separate with Space.

DESTINATION_CHAT_ID.description: Destination Chat IDs. Separate with Space.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Heroku API Key from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

FORWARD_FROM_CHAT_ID.description: Source channel to watch for incomming message to be forwarded.

FORWARD_TO_CHAT_ID.description: Destination channel that forward message is goint go to be sent.
